actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide for the revocation or suspension of registration of practitioners who furnish maintenance or detoxification treatment without being registered to do so.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Provides, under the Controlled Substances Act, for the revocation or suspension of registration of practitioners who furnish maintenance or detoxification treatment without being registered to do so.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide for the revocation or suspension of registration of practitioners who furnish maintenance or detoxification treatment without being registered to do so.
